lead_paragraph: Shortly after Jesse Owens returned home from his snubbing by Adolf Hitler at the 1936 Olympics, he and America's 17 other black Olympians found a less-than-welcoming reception from their own government, as well.

headline.print_headline: 1936 Olympians Receive Overdue Recognition at White House
headline.main: 1936 Olympians Receive Overdue Recognition at White House

snippet: Shortly after Jesse Owens returned home from his snubbing by Adolf Hitler at the 1936 Olympics, he and America's 17 other black Olympians found a less-than-welcoming reception from their own government, as well....
